item.title: How do i add a barrows shop!
item.dc:creator: @SourSoul SourSoul
item.description:
@SourSoul wrote:

Hi!
Open up Autospawn.cfg. Add an Npc. Then add a shop and set that Npc to the Shop owner. I’m sure you can find a Tutorial on how to add shops in the Tutorials section. Then Trade, Examine, Attack Or Talk To the Npc. Then add Items to the shop. There should be a Tutorial in the same Section.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add a barrows shop!
